description:
The [Café][] table was scaled down as a reading desk for a 2 year old -- designer [Joni Steiner's][] niece, Edie. It also happens to be the perfect height for a coffee table, for older family members! The Edie table has prototyped the use of lego-style friction fastenings, reducing assembly time. The finished product feels rock solid, whilst being small and light enough to easily move around a room. It is available to download for free, or to buy as part of the [Edie Set][]. [Café]: /designs/cafe [Edie Set]: /designs/edie-set [Joni Steiner's]: /designers/joni-steiner ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/edie/edie-table/get-it-made) **£190 - 240** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/edie/edie-table/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? Opendesk can help! »](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out) [Opendesk can help you](mailto:sales@opendesk.cc) specify designs, visualise your new space, obtain quotes and manage your project from start to finish. All products bought through Opendesk include a 12-month guarantee. Current UK pricing for this product & service (again including support for the designer and platform): **£215** **[REQUEST CALL BACK](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out)** _This service is only available in the UK at the moment, if you are outside the UK you can connect to a local maker near you. The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
name: Edie Table
